definition: main/principal/major/primary
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to demand/to request/to coerce

sentences.english: It was easily good enough for pole so that was the main thing.
sentences.chinese: 那一圈跑得不錯，足以使我獲得杆位，那是最主要的。

sentences.english: Reductions in staffing at the major banks.
sentences.chinese: 在裁減人員時的主要銀行。

sentences.english: The dissertation consists of introduction and four parts.
sentences.chinese: 全文分爲緒論和四個主要章節。

sentences.english: The first part: to discuss the main concepts and characteristics of commercial subject.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章，主要介紹商主體的概念和特徵。

sentences.english: Now she is a teacher of Diligent Education, teaching middle school students, mainly engaged in teaching English.
sentences.chinese: 現是用心教育中學部老師，主要從事英語的教學。

sentences.english: Madame Defarge was one of the leading spirits of the Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 迪法熱夫人是這場革命的主要人物之一。

sentences.english: The main difficulty of off-line handwritten signature verification is feature extraction.
sentences.chinese: 離線手寫簽名鑑別的主要困難在於簽名特徵的提取。

sentences.english: The new premier is forming his government mainly from young men.
sentences.chinese: 這位新總理主要從年輕人中物色人選組建政府。

sentences.english: The government brought two hundred eighty-five charges against him, mostly for murder.
sentences.chinese: 政府對他提出二百八十五費，主要用於謀殺。

sentences.english: The sources of Chinese medicine are mainly floras, also includes animals and mineral.
sentences.chinese: 中藥的來源主要是植物，也有一些動物和礦物。

sentences.english: The main reason of death was hemorrhagic shock.
sentences.chinese: 失血性休克是死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: The geology effect of 3-D seismic exploration in HK area, Jianghan region is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹江漢HK地區三維地震勘探的地質效果。

sentences.english: IntroductionThe centrosome is the major microtubule organizing center ( MTOC) of mammalian cells.
sentences.chinese: 中心體是哺乳類細胞主要的微管組織中心。

sentences.english: Ensure compliance to Crowne Plaza Keys mandatories and implementation of new standards.
sentences.chinese: 確保編輯皇冠假日主要條款並執行新標準。

sentences.english: But this kind of catabolism mainly concentrates on the banana skin.
sentences.chinese: 而這種分解代謝主要集中在香蕉皮上。

sentences.english: Loess is widely distributed in China, and it mainly lies in the central and western regions.
sentences.chinese: 黃土在我國分佈廣泛，而且主要分佈在中西部地區。

definition: next/secondly
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
cause/origin/root cause/reason/CL:個|个[ge4]
to concentrate/to centralize/to focus/centralized/concentrated/to put together
to rely mainly on/to attach most importance to
the most important/of chief importance
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
first (of all)/in the first place
on the one hand
purpose/aim/goal/target/objective/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put emphasis on/to stress
in large part/the greater part/the majority
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
part/share/section/piece/CL:個|个[ge4]
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
